data.Name: Steel Panther - The Res-Erections Tour
data.Description: DOORS: 7PM SHOW: 8PM AGES 16+ WELCOME WITH VALID ID. SUPPORT ACTS SUBJECT TO CHANGE WITHOUT NOTICE. In the best interest of fans and staff, the Event Organizer will continue to monitor local COVID-19 trends and meet or exceed protocols mandated by local governments. Fans attending the event agree to abide by the health and safety measures in effect at the time of the event, which may include, but not be limited to, wearing masks, providing proof of vaccination status and/or providing proof of negative COVID-19 test. THE FILLMORE AUDITORIUM IS A GENERAL ADMISSION VENUE.
